bug.short_desc: Package BIRT Statistical Report component as an as-is component.

long_desc.thetext:
Package BIRT Statistical Report component as an as-is component.
The following plug-ins and feature should be packaged as the BIRT Trace Report component:
Plugins: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user
Feature: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt
Name: Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT) Statistical Reports
Description: Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT) Statistical Reports are used to aggregate and summarize numerous statistical events over a period of time (report window). The BIRT trace reports present statistical events in tables and charts so users can easily locate trends and effectually analyze.
Also, please remove the following plug-ins/features from the TPTP packages (run-time, SDK, update site):
Plugins: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user
Feature: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt
Finally, please remove the following plug-in from CVS: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui
Joel: Please only remove the contents of the following plug-in in CVS: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui

(In reply to comment #0)
> Description: > Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT) Statistical Reports are used > to > aggregate and summarize numerous statistical events over a period of time > (report window). The BIRT trace reports present statistical events in tables > and charts so users can easily locate trends and effectually analyze.
Correction:
Business Intelligence and Reporting Tools (BIRT) Statistical Reports are used to aggregate and summarize numerous statistical events over a period of time. The BIRT statistical reports present statistical events in tables and charts so users can easily locate trends and effectually analyze.

(In reply to comment #0)
> Finally, please remove the following plug-in from CVS: > org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui
Done!
Note, there is no org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user plug-in.
The feature org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt has been moved to the as-is section. The feature has been removed from the SDK, the source generation, as well as the Platform Runtime.

(In reply to comment #3) > (In reply to comment #0) > > > Finally, please remove the following plug-in from CVS: > > org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.ui > > Done! > > Note, there is no org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user > plug-in. >
There is now! The content was hidden in the org.eclipse.tptp.platform.report.birt.doc.user plug-in. Please incliude the org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt.doc.user plugin in the org.eclipse.tptp.platform.statistical.report.birt fdeature. You can also remove the org.eclipse.tptp.platform.report.birt.doc.user plug-in from the build.
Added the org.eclipse.tptp.platform.report.birt.doc.user plug-in to the build.
